metadata.title: CVE-2023-46051 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** TeX Live 944e257 allows a NULL pointer dereference intexk/web2c/pdftexdir/tounicode.c. NOTE: this is disputed because it shouldbe categorized as a usability problem.

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
